DOC.brief_title: Intrastromal Presbyopia Correction Means Femtosecond Laser

The incision apply mean FEMTEC femtosecond laser system INTRACOR software module use pattern consist 6 concentric ring 3 different inner ring diameter . A similar pattern 5 concentric ring one fix inner diameter currently clinical investigation . The intrastromal incision perform femtosecond laser FEMTEC , CE certify various therapeutic indication . The incision eliminate epithelial endothelial opening cornea whereby minimally invasive character form treatment guarantee . A detailed pre-operative examination ensure every interested willing patient fulfils inclusion criterion study .
